root.name: textSize()

js_mode.description:
Font support for the Canvas element varies across browsers. FireFox currently has the best support, but still uses a pre-defined set of fonts. (Documentation to follow soon.) Good alternatives to the browser's Canvas-font functions are available: such as the Glyph method. See also: Canvas Text, BurntToys Bauhaus.

Please use the follwoing demos to learn how fonts can be rendered in Firefox with Processing.js: Letters, Words, width()

root.description: Sets the current font size. This size will be used in all subsequent calls to the text() function. Font size is measured in units of pixels.
